title: Used People - An Unconventional Widow's Story; Embracing Life After Loss of Spouse
description: And just like that, as if a split second happened in slow motion – Tina’s entire world changed. "Normal" has an entirely new realm; and simple words now carry an immeasurable weight. Suddenly, there are questions: What now? How? What about yesterday? What about tomorrow? What about time?
author: Stella Stella
